info.description: Secure, internal endpoints for moderating community content and managing public data sources used by the Morphereum Community API. This spec follows a modular, JSON-only structure with $ref pointers for paths and reusable components. All routes are served under /api and, unless noted, require a valid Bearer JWT for access.

tags.name: Auth
tags.description: Authentication and token issuance. Contains the public login endpoint used to obtain a JWT. All other tags/routes require a valid Bearer token.

tags.name: Arts
tags.description: Moderation tools for community artworks: list submissions (paginated), approve or reject items, and manage gallery entries.

tags.name: Links
tags.description: CRUD for curated and official links exposed in the public API. Admins can create, update, reorder, and remove items.

tags.name: Raids
tags.description: Manage the daily raid configuration: create/update the target, platform, share message, and related content displayed to the community.
